details.arabic_diacless: رب اجعل هٰذا البلد اٰمنا واجنبنى وبنى ان نـعبد الاصنامؕ
details.arabic: رَبِّ اجۡعَلۡ هٰذَا الۡبَلَدَ اٰمِنًا وَّاجۡنُبۡنِىۡ وَبَنِىَّ اَنۡ نَّـعۡبُدَ الۡاَصۡنَامَؕ
details.transliteration: rabbi ijAAal hatha albalada aminan wajnubneewabaniyya an naAAbuda al-asnam
details.translations: My Lord, make this city [Makkah] secure and keep me and my sons away from worshipping idols.
